charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1101_010:
While [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
through an eerie forest, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Acerola
and Tapu Bulu.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0401_040: Tapu Bulu and I are here to check out this forest!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0401_050: I really like how dark and quiet it is, but...
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0402_070:
They’re not with me right now. It’s just me and
Tapu Bulu today!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0402_080:
I’m sure my Ghost-type Pokémon would love this
forest, too, but...
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_090:
Since we’re here, I figured why not take the
opportunity to make it lush!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_100:
I could have Tapu Bulu grow more
vegetation for it!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_120: It seems Tapu Bulu’s not in the mood.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0301_130:
Maybe it’s not interested in
this forest.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0401_140:
Well, it hasn’t tried to leave, so I think it likes
it here.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0302_150: Is it in a bad mood?
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0402_160:
Well... Tapu Bulu behaves much differently when
it’s in a bad mood...
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_170: So I’ve been trying to figure out what’s going on.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_180: Tapu Bulu must like the forest the way it is.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_190: Maybe it feels calm in a desolate place like this.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_200:
Tapu Bulu are known to dislike
unnecessary conflict.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_210:
This Tapu Bulu isn’t the guardian deity of
Ula’ula Island, but...
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_220:
Apparently, the Tapu Bulu of Ula’ula also spends
time alone in the ruins in the desert, where
people hardly ever go.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0301_230: It sounds like a kind Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0401_240: *chuckle* It’s more than just kind, you know!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0302_250: It sounds like a calm Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0402_260: *giggle* It’s more than just calm, you know!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_270: The tapu get reeeally scary when they’re angry!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_280:
There’s a place on Ula’ula Island that’s important
to its guardian deity, Tapu Bulu.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_290:
And there are stories that something terrible
happened because humans were ruining it...
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_300:
My Tapu Bulu seems to like this forest, so no
funny business, OK?
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_0402_340:
*giggle* I’ll tell you about it if you ever come
to Alola!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_350:
So, yeah, just remember that the Tapu Bulu in
Alola is a deity, and it gets scary when it’s mad!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_360:
To me, it’s an amazing Pokémon close to my
heart, but it’s also scary powerful.
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_370: That’s why I’m so happy Tapu Bulu is my partner!
charaepi_ch0007_10_acerola/2301_1201_380:
I hope you get to know Tapu Bulu better and
become friends with it, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
